website_summaries.verdict: Warm gloves that also allow you to operate a touchscreen device while you're wearing them.
pros: Handmade imported gloves that include cashmere lining for maximum warmth and softness
Smartphone screens are able to read touches even when you're wearing the gloves
Desirable, high-quality materials that customers love
cons: Glove sizes tend to run a little small

customer_reviews.title: Great look and very warm!
customer_reviews.text: Great look and extremely warm. They could with stand NYC weather. Medium fit me perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Warm and well made so far
customer_reviews.text: I have had these a few weeks, they are warm in the cold weather. PROS: + Warm + Soft lining + Look nice + Work with my phone and car's keyless entry handles CONS: None so far
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Fit - Fit seems pretty true to size
customer_reviews.text: Fit - Fit seems pretty true to size. I ordered a large and it's just a hint big on me, but I usually take a medium to large glove for most things. Quality - Seems excellent so far, but I've only owned them for a few days. Stitching all seems well done, leather is soft and supple Feel- Extremely soft inside... Almost like a micro fleece type of liner. Should hold up very well in the winter and I expect them to be warm. Overall, I would buy these again and I do recommend them to anybody looking for a nice pair of leather gloves for cold climate.
customer_reviews.author: paul milos

customer_reviews.title: Feel and fit great! .... Ripped at two seams in under 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I got these gloves in the mail and was extremely excited! They were exactly what I needed and fit exactly as described. They were warm and windproof. Unfortunately, I have worn them maybe two dozen times now, and today when I put them on I noticed two seams have ripped. The area between each finger looks to be quite stressed. Either I got a bad apple or the materials used are very low quality. I did not abuse these gloves, they have simply been used for driving. Will try to contact seller/mfgr to see if a replacement fairs better, otherwise my opinion is that you should look elsewhere. Will update review as applicable.
customer_reviews.author: JaveStack

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully made and very effective hand warmers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit - just as measured by the sizing instructions. The rich, but subtle smell of Italian leather is delicious. The gloves are so smooth, that I find myself privately stroking them - but, I probably shouldn't tell you that :>. So far, they have kept my hands warm in 30 degree weather, yet are thin enough to be used as driving gloves. The luxurious, generously and excellently sewn in cashmere lining, is an excellent insulator in conjunction with these gloves. They look great with both formal and casual clothing. If you're on the fence about purchasing them, jump off and buy them.
customer_reviews.author: davyboy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Nice look and very comfortable. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Juanito

customer_reviews.title: Touch senstive screens work, but precision requires slowness
customer_reviews.text: The touch senstiveness is kinda klunky. Most importantly, it does work. But because the finger tips outside shape does not match real fingers, you have to go slowly and carefully. You get faster with practice, but I don't think I will ever get enough practice for swiping, especially virtual keyboards where you slide your finger around. As gloves, they are also pretty good. Easy to get on and off, but that probably depends on the luck of their size and my hand size. Keep me warm enough, but they are no substitute for really insulated gloves if it gets below 0F (-20C); for those conditions, they'll keep the wind off whiel you go out to your car.
customer_reviews.author: Scarecrow Repair

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive gloves, especially for the price. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive gloves, especially for the price. I do wish they were a touch more snug. I seem to be able to use the thumb 50% of the time with my iPhone. Otherwise if you’re looking for warm, professional looking gloves at a remarkably reasonable price.. these are it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon S.

customer_reviews.title: These are gifts for someone else so I can comment ...
customer_reviews.text: These are gifts for someone else so I can comment on the usability or durability but they seem very well made and and warm/soft on the interior. I bought a medium upon request of the recipient and they are a touch to big on me and I have somewhat larger than average woman's hands if that helps anyone with sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha S

customer_reviews.title: It’s a go
customer_reviews.text: These are dope, the cashmere on the inside gives it a nice premium feel, they are very warm and look good for the price. The touchscreen capability is ok, definitely not better than your finger as should be expected. The fit was pretty good, I measured around my knuckles 8.9 inches so I ordered the large gloves and the are a good fit. The fingers are a lil long but I kind of have short stubby fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Young Hecty

customer_reviews.title: The leather seems nice, however I was ordering Cashmere Lined leather gloves
customer_reviews.text: The leather seems nice, however I was ordering Cashmere Lined leather gloves; I have worn cashmere lined leather gloves for years, having several pair. These gloves are lined with some type of plush but not cashmere. As those who are familiar with cashmere lined gloves, there is a tag sewn on the interior noting that they are '100% cashmere'.... no description of any kind on these glove's lining, only the statement on the listing. I am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: dk

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: These fit as expected. They are pretty warm and look very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Customer 2234877

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made.  Extremely poor quality.  Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Just unboxed these gloves. They are constructed of cheap leather scraps. The stitching is extremely poor quality. There are loose threads sticking out. The edges are lined with brown leather trim, which doesn't match black gloves at all and is an eyesore. I full expect them to tear in the first month. Thought they would be of somewhat more quality since I spent 30 dollars on them. Total waste of money; spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: John Galt

customer_reviews.title: Effective and Warm
customer_reviews.text: They are a very nice fit, and the feel of the leather is wonderful. I really love the fact that my man can operate his technology and still keep his hands warm.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Little

customer_reviews.title: Be Wary of Salt
customer_reviews.text: The gloves say they are made for winter, but if you are opening your car door wearing these and it has salt residue from the road on it, your glove are going to end up stained a dry white color. However if this happens, fear not, just apply a dollop of Mink Oil on each glove and rub it in like you're rubbing in hand lotion. This not only cleans the leather of salt, it also water proofs them. Aside from the salt issue, the gloves are great. They feel nice on the hand, they perform adequately for touch screen usage, and they look professional.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not for driving...perfect for a night on the town
customer_reviews.text: Nice soft leather gloves...however these are not true driving gloves. They are however very nice leather gloves with a soft lining. Look more expensive than they are...and come in a nice gift box.
customer_reviews.author: Big Al

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in every way.
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are of excellent quality and have the look and feel of a much more expensive pair. The leather is extremely soft and supple. The cashmere lining is luxurious. These gloves are a real pleasure to wear.
customer_reviews.author: L. Perrotta

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Great quality soft leather. I was going to get the xxl for my husband who has big hands but decided to get the xl instead(i can always exchange) but I didn't have to! There's still a little room but they are perfect, No need to stretch like most leather gloves. Very comfortable and not stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Check the size very well
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are of a high quality, after looking a lot for decent gloves, I decided to import them by Amazon (I'm from Mexico). I measured my hand many times, I really did, I am very insecure to buy clothes online, and yet I measured something wrong, I bought gloves size XL, but they were a little big, I think it would have been better with a size L, but The gloves are amazing, despite being somewhat large for my hand I still use them whenever I can in winter.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Moctezuma Luna

customer_reviews.title: Just a Great Paid of Gloves
customer_reviews.text: The sizing fit me perfectly. I followed the sizing chart, and it worked out perfectly. These are first class and reasonably warm. Great driver's gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Be Good

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Light Gloves
customer_reviews.text: These are my go-to gloves. If I am only planning to be out for a short period, they do fine even in cold weather, and they are excellent for mobility. If it is really cold, I use this as an inner layer and pair them with heavier gloves, which works very well. Also, I can just take off the heavy gloves and have some protection and mobility if I need to do something which the gloves would get in the way of.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous quality leather and craftmanship
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful kid leather: supple and quality made! This is the 2nd pair I have purchased as a gift. The first was for my boyfriend 2 years ago. This year I purchased for my son as an early Christmas present. When he opened the box, his eyes just sparkled. Purchased an XL. They fit beautifully, can still use I phone and they are lined for the perfect warmth to keep hands extra warm. Great value and craftmanship!
customer_reviews.author: SEC Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great warm gloves.
customer_reviews.text: These for the price are amazing. Just slightly on the bulky side but these keep my hands toasty. Purchased mainly because I drive a manual and my shift knob is solid metal which in turn makes it frozen in winter and blazing hot in summer. Basically these are great for winter and look way more than what they sell for.
customer_reviews.author: Jusburnin_dc5

customer_reviews.title: Used the “Buy Again”...not the same!
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same gloves that I ordered before. Used the “Buy Again” option. Not the same fit and at the top of the glove that covers your wrist has a brown border. This was not on the last pair. Gave the last pair to my brother who lives in Nevada, I live in SoCal (he needs them more).
customer_reviews.author: Joe Pro

customer_reviews.title: Is there a women’s version of this?!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great! I suggest getting your normal size. My boyfriend loves these gloves and says they’re warm. Good quality product! Would buy again even as a gift for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Super warm and touchscreen works well
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with the touch screen technology and effectiveness of these gloves. I’ve had “touchscreen” gloves in the past but they sometimes work and sometimes don’t but these gloves don’t miss a beat. It’s like texting barhanded honestly. They fit well. The fingers aren't cut too big like cheap pairs of gloves sometimes are. The inside lining is very soft. I do believe it has 3M thinsulate layer as it comes with true 3M label and my hands get warm quickly with these gloves on. Compared with the last two pairs of gloves I've owned, these seem to compare well with the expensive pair I bought from the large leather store. I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Soft and functional
customer_reviews.text: These are as good as the money can buy. I'd say they're even better than designer gloves which cost twice the price. They're soft, but not as warm as I'd like. I think that 40 degrees f is the coldest it can be used to keep warm.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Very soft leather. Lovely gloves and nicely packaged. They appear well made, but as a gift, will have to see how well they last. There is a thin brown trim around the edge of the black, with actually gives a very classy look. I am very pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, not the best fit
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are great quality. The touchscreen aspect works great and is very accurate. My only real complaint is that they really don't fit all that well. I went with the sizing they recommended and they fit well in the one finger I measured. My other fingers all have at least a quarter inch of extra at the tip. The lining also doesn't seem to be as long as the shell is, so the leather tends to be a little loose. All in all they're good gloves, I just wish they were a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny59020

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!  VERY luxurious glove - pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely 'high end' glove with super soft insides (fur like - but not real fur (yay! ) High quality stitching and absolutely high end, top quality glove. Perhaps the best I have ever purchased. Comes in gift box as well. I will order this again. Great value and top quality
customer_reviews.author: Pat Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed. fit is not good.
customer_reviews.text: The little finger and some of the others have way too much room, an inch in the little finger to the end of my finger and the glove. I measured as directed. Going to spend real money on real gloves. Cashmere? Yeah, sure. Do not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: TheEditor

customer_reviews.title: Much better than I expect
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure what to expect of these, but the outer leather is nice and the inner lining is comfortable. The reason I picked this pair Coz they have full hand screen touch which is amazing! I’m pretty sure my bf will love it. Because I love it!
customer_reviews.author: XL

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of gloves. Great quality, better than I expected actually for the price. They keep my hands pretty warm as well. It was about 30 degrees when I wore these and my hands felt good. Only con is they don’t work with a phone, but for the price it’s good.
customer_reviews.author: President Jon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've used these gloves 5 times. Now, as you can see from the photo, the sow of the inside of the thumb finger glove getting undone. I would've expected more from these gloves
customer_reviews.author: J.P. & T. Romo

customer_reviews.title: A bit expensive for what it gives u, not good for NY winters.
customer_reviews.text: They're warm enough until it drops lower than 5°c, by that time you're gonna need your pockets or heat badge inside or something, also the ability to use a touch screen with it only worked for a few days but later it stopped working with most of the fingers, although the gloves still look fine from outside but they probably wear out from inside, I just think it was too much for the money
customer_reviews.author: Migo Megahed

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet!
customer_reviews.text: This wallet fits perfect in your pocket and is made of great leather! I ordered a second one for my sock drawer. I love how deep the pockets are so one can't see your money at the time of purchase. What really excites me is the zipped pouch that is perfectly made into the wallet. I'm going to buy this wallet for several members of my family in the near future. Decreatness is the most important thing about a wallet and this scores 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: The best leather gloves for winter
customer_reviews.text: I don't skimp on gloves, but I can say, these are the nicest gloves I've owned by far. I needed a brown pair for my brown coat and went with this 3M thinsulate brown gloves. Absolutely wonderful. I can verify that I can manipulate my iPhone touchscreen with the fingers as well, which is very convenient. These gloves are very comfortable so far and look fantastic. Gloves came in a very nice box and were packaged very professionally. Really pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Enid

customer_reviews.title: Not a perfect fit, but I have oddly sized hands
customer_reviews.text: Not a perfect fit, but I have oddly sized hands. They're quite warm, enough for use here in Texas during the recent freeze we had (15*F with moderate wind.) Touchscreen capability is inaccurate for detail work, but will work fine if you're careful. Gesture commands and basic manipulation work well. Basically don't expect to be typing unless you're on a tablet, as typing with these on is tedious. The leather feels quite nice, and they have a clean classy look. The lining however feels amazing. Very comfortable. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Avirett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are great! Using the size chart on the site I was able to quickly determine the correct size to order. When they arrived I opened the package and put them on.....a perfect fit. Thanks for including the easy to use size chart
customer_reviews.author: BrianV

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and warm. I really can't believe how nice these are for such a low price. They are real leather! The lining is soft and thick enough for winter and the best part for me is they actually fit! They also appear to be high quality and a good fit - not too snug and difficult to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Han

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Great product, my husband loves them. They’re warm and well made, and they fit well except for the thumb is oddly a bit too long. They also do work on touchscreen products as advertised, which is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Sprouts

customer_reviews.title: Tactile gloves
customer_reviews.text: I am able to use my phone when it is freezing outside. The tactile quality of these gloves allow me to use all touchscreen devices while wearing these. Keeps my hands warm, allows flexibility and is fully tactile.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Scott Turnbloom

customer_reviews.title: More than expected, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I was just looking for an affordable, warm, touch screen usable pair of gloves. I received way more than that. These arrive meticulously packaged, incredibly comfortable, work perfectly on touch screens (all fingers). Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Derek B

customer_reviews.title: Quality is very good.
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice quality gloves. They're better than I expected...actually much better. The leather is thicker, smooth, and solid. The lining is soft and warm. The fit is true to size. They arrive in a beautiful box if wanting to give as a gift. The touchscreen works well. I was able to text and easily use the iphone camera. Quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: The gloves came after Christmas as they came from China, but it was worth the wait. They were nicely boxed and they fit my husband perfectly. They're even nicer looking than the photo. They're very soft and nicely made. My husband is pretty fussy about his gloves and he's very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Designer MomTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This gloves are very useful to me, and also its material is very comfortable it is leather material, fixed size to me and support me a nice fraction when l grab something , it is very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: Assassin hours
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and attractive gloves. They are pretty warm as well. The only problem is that the opening has no real way to keep the cold out from my wrists which is not a big problem. Makes me feel like murdering someone with a silenced gun.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Meant for Asian fingers I think.
customer_reviews.text: So it fits fine around the hand and is even a little loose as I wanted to order it a bit larger. However, my fingers are too long. The knuckles of the gloves rest on the lower section of my fingers. Making it uncomfortable to grab things etc. It is very unfortunate as I really liked the quality of the gloves and the inside liner is so soft and comfortable. Also will keep your hands warm. So if you have short fingers go for it. Also I believe this is made in china for the Chinese market based on the design.
customer_reviews.author: Zubber

customer_reviews.title: 1 YEAR LATER REVIEW - Touch Sensitivity Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: I initially loved these gloves, but after time, the touch sensitivity slowly completely went away. They no longer work with ANY phone. At first, they were great and they were some of the best gloves I've ever used with a phone. However, any phone does not seem to register that I am touching it unless I press VERY hard - even then, it's poor and unusable. I'd still recommend them if you're just looking for leather gloves, but don't expect the touch capabilities to last.
customer_reviews.author: D. Moore

customer_reviews.title: These Are Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these--great fit--not too tight, not too loose, and given the quality, these will age very well. I love wearing them around town, on the commute, in the car, etc. They work very well with touchscreens as well--I was skeptical, but they're perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Dunshee

customer_reviews.title: Very classy gloves!
customer_reviews.text: I have never owned gloves this nice before, so, this is new territory for me! I will say however, these gloves are everything that I was expecting and hoping for! As soon as I opened the package, I smelled leather. Tried them on, perfect fit. How did they feel? FANTASTIC!!! They will need to be broken-in a bit, (be happy-this means they're NEW) I cannot unlock my phone with them on though, but its because my phone is unlocked by fingerprint (which is NOT a shortcoming of the gloves by any means).
customer_reviews.author: kate petronis

customer_reviews.title: Warm, stylish, and worked with my iPhone!
customer_reviews.text: I had to fly into Chicago for a meeting a few weeks ago, leaving Orlando's warm 85F temp to land to Chicago's slightly chillier 19F temps. I walked around the city and my hands were definitely warm and very comfortable. And bonus I was able to call up my Lyft without taking off my gloves!
customer_reviews.author: mo_disk00

customer_reviews.title: Works well and fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about buying gloves online, since it's hard to know if they'll fit well, but these gloves did not disappoint. They fit perfectly-- just follow the sizing instructions. The gloves works well on my iPhone (including swiping motions for Pokémon Go ;)). They are soft, not bulky, and the fingers flex easily. They will be good for mildly cold weather, but I can't see them being warm enough for below-freezing temperatures/ snow.
customer_reviews.author: F. Lum

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and Practical
customer_reviews.text: We gave these as a holiday gift. They are beautiful gloves and fit well. We dropped one star because they don't really allow the wearer to use the touch screen as advertised -- sometimes yes, sometimes no.
customer_reviews.author: J.G. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Second time I've bought these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these for my son last Christmas and he likes them so much, I bought a pair for my husband this year. I haven't given them to him, yet, but I'm sure he'll love them. The leather is soft and supple and the lining is wonderful. Touchscreen works, but not as well as your skin - as expected.
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Get Dat CASHMERE!!
customer_reviews.text: Get Dat CASHMERE!! Zomg!! Yesh... of course I got the cashmere interior, do eetz!! Not only does it feel O-mazing but it will trap in more body heat for joo! These gloves are super awesome and first pair of good gloves I've ever owned. It's like they make love to your hands!!! I've been using them for months now and they feeeel and looook sooooo good! From the exterier to the interior they're very well made. No bad smells, tears, or rips at all thus far and I have no doubt these will last me for years! As the merovingian stated.... "It's like wiping your a** with silk... I loooooove eeeet!!!!"
customer_reviews.author: SoleCipher

customer_reviews.title: Good Gloves, but not even a little bit DRIVING gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves, fit well, look good, and are warm. It should be noted though that they're definitely not driving gloves. They have so much padding in them you will not feel your steering wheel. Good luck pressing any buttons, and just forget about finding a key in your pocket. I'll be keeping these as winter gloves but am still in search of a good pair of driving gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: The gloves started to fall apart almost immediately.
customer_reviews.text: The gloves were the right color, very comfortable on the inside, and the leather seemed OK although it smelled a little bit. I would be fairly satisfied with the gloves, except that less than a weeks worth of years later the leather on the inside of the gloves is already peeling away. If you want your gloves for more than a week, then I wouldn't buy this. Fairly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kipper

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and super soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: Not only do these gloves look excellent, but they're super soft on the inside and feel great on my hands. Even the box they came in radiates quality. They keep my hands warm without feeling bulky. I used my iPhone with the gloves on. They really are touchscreen capable. The fit is true to the size. I love the adjustable scrap and find it useful for keeping the warmth in and wind out. I highly recommend these gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Craft

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious feel from soft leather exterior
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these gloves in large, and was pleased with the soft, luxurious outer material, and the contrasting trim around the opening. They are warm and, yes, they work well with touchscreen controls. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Sasson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband as a Christmas gift since we were heading off to colder climates for the holidays. They fit great and he says they are amazingly warm. They look very expensive and are very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Read, Travel, Love

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious and well made
customer_reviews.text: These gloves feel amazing and luxurious! My fiancé kept touching them and saying how nice they were. They are very well made and extremely soft inside. They also fit very well. He has big hands so it is hard to find nice gloves that fit him well. He absolutely loved these gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca B

customer_reviews.title: These are super and work great with iPhone
customer_reviews.text: These are not the warmest gloves around, but they're very comfortable and I can use my iPhone nicely with them. My second pair... both were exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: PhilG

customer_reviews.title: Save you money!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these gloves for my husband. Advertising states that they are Italian Leather but when received there was nothing indicating real Italian leather and the tag says made in China. Also advertising stated they keep your hands warm even in -20 degree weather. Where we live the temp was 25 degrees and the day he wore them his hands were still cold. He will be using these more in the fall. Definitely not worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: goochie215

customer_reviews.title: very good quality for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with my product. it is real leather and has some nice faux fur inside. they are so warm that when outside at ~50 degrees Fahrenheit I had to take them off after a few minutes because my hands were too warm, I don't think that -20 Fahrenheit is a good estimate however if you won't is in those temperatures for more than 30-40mins at a time it should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Gloves did not last
customer_reviews.text: I just recently purchased these gloves. When I initially put them on I loved how they felt. But after having them for under a week I noticed a large tear in the index finger.
customer_reviews.author: tr

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are cheap but they look nice. They aren’t super warm but they do a good job of keeping your hands warm and blocking cold air. They have held up well after several weeks of frequent use and I’m very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: PharmD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. Con
customer_reviews.text: Pro: These glove are soft and warm! Definitely to have for winter season driving especially when need to warm up the car. The measurements are exact. Advise to measure your hands before purchasing. My hands are 8.1 Small. Perfect fit. Con: Only issue is the tipping point sometimes doesn't interact with my S7 bottom touch screens (with case slightly in the way).
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Bodacious butchered baby bunny/cat-fur lined glove
customer_reviews.text: These are bodacious! Fit was excellent; I have large hands which make OTC gloves worthless. Made in China with fur lining of unknown origin. May be the fur of cats and dogs that they butcher over there!
customer_reviews.author: T. BUECHLEIN

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and as advertised. They fit like a glove! (Hah, see what I did there? Oh I kill myself!!) Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Martini

customer_reviews.title: BIG HANDS .... big gloves
customer_reviews.text: big hands big gloves. nice. great fit and feel. real nice lining perfect. for every day winter use.
customer_reviews.author: BTM

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, fit well, but lose touch screen capability.
customer_reviews.text: The leather is great, the cashmere lining is wonderfully soft, and they fit perfectly. I only wish they were a little longer. Edit: Had these for a little over two months now and the fingers no longer interact with any of my touch screens. They're also a bit thin, don't hold up under single digit temperatures fahrenheit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves, good for every day but not extremely warm
customer_reviews.text: These are ok, soft cashmere lined gloves. The lining is not necessarily thick enough to provide ample warmth in a 30-40 degree day with a bit of a breeze. That said, the touch screen works well and the gloves are very soft. If you're looking for standard gloves with a soft lining and a little warmth protection these are nice
customer_reviews.author: randumtasx
